title: Kristy Maxwell investigates
description: The ChallengeAn evil was traveling up through the American West Coast leaving madness and death in its wake. As it turns east towards the small city of Garry, Detective Lieutenant Kristina Maxwell must find a way to stop it in its tracks, or more lives will be lost.Death on the lineNancy Forbes ran from a life that brought her no joy and after twenty-one years believed that she was safe. But the past has a way of catching up with you and hers turned up to show her that even if you run, you can't hide. Kristina Maxwell must travel through Nancy's past to find out how she ended up dead on a railway line.
author: Eve Adam
